about.summary: pyceres provides minimal Python bindings for the Ceres Solver and the implementation of factor graphs for bundle adjustment and pose graph optimization.

name: pyceres

about.summary: pyceres provides minimal Python bindings for the Ceres Solver and the implementation of factor graphs for bundle adjustment and pose graph optimization.
pyceres provides minimal Python bindings for the Ceres Solver and the implementation of factor graphs for bundle adjustment and pose graph optimization.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyceres" %}
{% set version = "1.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://github.com/cvg/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 47729ac53ac21b18071f5772194a92c1af296e7fced08274185952a0efb6833b
    patches:
      - fix-cmake.patch
      - fixup-version-number.patch
      - fix-win-build.patch
      - fix-glog-init.patch

build:
  number: 2
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - cmake
    - make                                   # [unix]
    - ninja                                  # [win]
    - pip                                    # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - python                                 # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - cross-python_{{ target_platform }}     # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - pybind11                               # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - numpy                                  # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - pkg-config
    - llvm-openmp                    # [osx]
    - libgomp                        # [linux]
    # x11 stuff
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}  # [unix and not arm64]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}  # [unix and not arm64]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcb') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxfixes') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxext') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxau') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('expat-devel') }}       # [linux]
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.17          # [linux64]
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - pybind11
    - boost-cpp
    - libblas
    - libcblas
    - colmap
    - cgal-cpp
    - ceres-solver
    - eigen
    - numpy
    - glog
    - gflags
    # x11 stuff
    - xorg-libxext                   # [unix]
    - xorg-libxdmcp                  # [unix]
    - xorg-libxau                    # [unix]
    - libxcb                         # [unix]
    - xorg-libxfixes                 # [unix]
    - xorg-libxrender                # [unix]
    - xorg-libx11                    # [unix]
    - xorg-libice                    # [unix]
    - xorg-libsm                     # [unix]
    - libglu                         # [linux]
  run:
    - python
    - boost-cpp
    - {{ pin_compatible("numpy") }}

test:
  imports:
    - pyceres
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/cvg/pyceres
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
  summary: pyceres provides minimal Python bindings for the Ceres Solver and the implementation of factor graphs for bundle adjustment and pose graph optimization.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Tobias-Fischer

about.summary: pyceres provides minimal Python bindings for the Ceres Solver and the implementation of factor graphs for bundle adjustment and pose graph optimization.
